title: 4 Raw T207 St. Louis -Must sell, make fair offer!
author: ColtWinchester

posts.post_title: 4 Raw T207 St. Louis -Must sell, make fair offer!
posts.post_content:
Hey guys these will be the last of the T207’s I’m selling. Had some financial issues and had to sacrifice my new venture with these. 2024 has started off a little less plentiful than I was hoping! These are asking prices. Sonic interested please let me know

Konetchy- $95
Evans - $160
Harmon - $60
Wilie - $50
Make a fair offer, really need to move these guys quickly.
